trans-unit.source: Represents a delegate, which is a data structure that refers to a static method or to a class instance and an instance method of that class.
trans-unit.target: 表示委托，委托是一种数据结构，它引用静态方法或引用类实例及该类的实例方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Delegate> class is the base class for delegate types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Delegate>类是委托类型的基类。

trans-unit.source: However, only the system and compilers can derive explicitly from the <xref:System.Delegate> class or from the <xref:System.MulticastDelegate> class.
trans-unit.target: 但是，只有系统和编译器可以从显式派生<xref:System.Delegate>类或从<xref:System.MulticastDelegate>类。

trans-unit.source: It is also not permissible to derive a new type from a delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 此外，还不允许从一个委托类型派生新类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Delegate> class is not considered a delegate type; it is a class used to derive delegate types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Delegate>类不被视为一个委托类型; 它是一个用于派生委托类型的类。

trans-unit.source: Most languages implement a `delegate` keyword, and compilers for those languages are able to derive from the <xref:System.MulticastDelegate> class; therefore, users should use the `delegate` keyword provided by the language.
trans-unit.target: 大多数语言实现`delegate`关键字和为那些语言编译器都能够派生自<xref:System.MulticastDelegate>类; 因此，用户应使用`delegate`由语言提供的关键字。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime provides an `Invoke` method for each delegate type, with the same signature as the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言运行时提供`Invoke`对于每个委托类型，具有相同签名与委托的方法。

trans-unit.source: You do not have to call this method explicitly from C#, Visual Basic, or Visual C++, because the compilers call it automatically.
trans-unit.target: 你不需要显式调用此方法，从 C#、 Visual Basic 或 Visual c + +，因为编译器自动调用它。

trans-unit.source: The `Invoke` method is useful in [reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md) when you want to find the signature of the delegate type.
trans-unit.target: `Invoke`方法就有用[反射](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md)当你想要查找的委托类型签名。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime provides each delegate type with `BeginInvoke` and `EndInvoke` methods, to enable asynchronous invocation of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言运行时提供每个委托类型与`BeginInvoke`和`EndInvoke`方法，以启用异步调用的委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information about these methods, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关这些方法的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。

trans-unit.source: The declaration of a delegate type establishes a contract that specifies the signature of one or more methods.
trans-unit.target: 委托类型的声明建立指定的一个或多个方法签名的协定。

trans-unit.source: A delegate is an instance of a delegate type that has references to:
trans-unit.target: 委托是具有对引用的委托类型的实例：

trans-unit.source: An instance method of a type and a target object assignable to that type.
trans-unit.target: 类型和目标对象赋值给该类型的实例方法。

trans-unit.source: An instance method of a type, with the hidden `this` parameter exposed in the formal parameter list.
trans-unit.target: 具有隐藏的类型的实例方法`this`公开形参表中的参数。

trans-unit.source: The delegate is said to be an open instance delegate.
trans-unit.target: 委托被称为是开放的实例委托。

trans-unit.source: A static method.
trans-unit.target: 一种静态方法。

trans-unit.source: A static method and a target object assignable to the first parameter of the method.
trans-unit.target: 静态方法，并且可分配给该方法的第一个参数的目标对象。

trans-unit.source: The delegate is said to be closed over its first argument.
trans-unit.target: 委托被称为关闭通过其第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information on delegate binding, see the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 有关绑定的委托的更多信息，请参阅<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, a delegate can represent a method only if the signature of the method exactly matches the signature specified by the delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，委托可以表示一种方法，仅当该方法的签名与委托类型所指定的签名完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: Thus, only the first and third bullets in the preceding list are supported, and the first bullet requires an exact type match.
trans-unit.target: 因此，仅第一个和第三个项目符号前面的列表中都受支持，并且第一个项目符号要求类型完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: When a delegate represents an instance method closed over its first argument (the most common case), the delegate stores a reference to the method's entry point and a reference to an object, called the target, which is of a type assignable to the type that defined the method.
trans-unit.target: 当委托表示通过其第一个参数 （最常见的用例） 关闭的实例方法时，该委托将存储对方法的入口点的引用和一个对象，称为目标，赋给定义的类型的类型的引用方法。

trans-unit.source: When a delegate represents an open instance method, it stores a reference to the method's entry point.
trans-unit.target: 当委托表示的打开的实例方法时，它将存储对方法的入口点的引用。

trans-unit.source: The delegate signature must include the hidden `this` parameter in its formal parameter list; in this case, the delegate does not have a reference to a target object, and a target object must be supplied when the delegate is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 委托签名必须包含隐藏`this`参数在其形参列表; 在这种情况下，委托不包含对目标对象的引用，并且当调用委托时，必须提供一个目标对象。

trans-unit.source: When a delegate represents a static method, the delegate stores a reference to the method's entry point.
trans-unit.target: 当委托表示的静态方法时，委托将存储对方法的入口点的引用。

trans-unit.source: When a delegate represents a static method closed over its first argument, the delegate stores a reference to the method's entry point and a reference to a target object assignable to the type of the method's first argument.
trans-unit.target: 当委托表示关闭通过其第一个参数的静态方法时，委托将存储对方法的入口点的引用以及对目标对象赋给该方法的第一个自变量的类型的引用。

trans-unit.source: When the delegate is invoked, the first argument of the static method receives the target object.
trans-unit.target: 当调用委托时，静态方法的第一个参数会收到目标对象。

trans-unit.source: The invocation list of a delegate is an ordered set of delegates in which each element of the list invokes exactly one of the methods represented by the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 委托的调用列表是列表的一组有序中的每个元素调用恰好有一个委托所表示的方法的委托。

trans-unit.source: An invocation list can contain duplicate methods.
trans-unit.target: 调用列表可以包含重复的方法。

trans-unit.source: During an invocation, methods are invoked in the order in which they appear in the invocation list.
trans-unit.target: 在调用时，过程调用列表中出现的顺序调用方法。

trans-unit.source: A delegate attempts to invoke every method in its invocation list; duplicates are invoked once for each time they appear in the invocation list.
trans-unit.target: 委托尝试调用其调用列表; 中的每个方法每次它们出现的调用列表中后，会调用重复项。

trans-unit.source: Delegates are immutable; once created, the invocation list of a delegate does not change.
trans-unit.target: 委托是不可变;创建后，委托的调用列表将不会更改。

trans-unit.source: Delegates are referred to as multicast, or combinable, because a delegate can invoke one or more methods and can be used in combining operations.
trans-unit.target: 委托被称作多路广播，或可组合，因为委托可以调用一个或多个方法，并且可以用在组合操作。

trans-unit.source: Combining operations, such as <xref:System.Delegate.Combine%2A> and <xref:System.Delegate.Remove%2A>, do not alter existing delegates.
trans-unit.target: 合并操作，如<xref:System.Delegate.Combine%2A>和<xref:System.Delegate.Remove%2A>，不会更改现有委托。

trans-unit.source: Instead, such an operation returns a new delegate that contains the results of the operation, an unchanged delegate, or `null`.
trans-unit.target: 相反，此类操作返回包含结果的操作，未更改的委托，一个新委托或`null`。

trans-unit.source: A combining operation returns `null` when the result of the operation is a delegate that does not reference at least one method.
trans-unit.target: 组合操作返回`null`操作的结果时不引用至少一种方法的委托。

trans-unit.source: A combining operation returns an unchanged delegate when the requested operation has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当请求的操作不起作用，组合操作将返回未更改的委托。

trans-unit.source: Managed languages use the <xref:System.Delegate.Combine%2A> and <xref:System.Delegate.Remove%2A> methods to implement delegate operations.
trans-unit.target: 托管语言使用<xref:System.Delegate.Combine%2A>和<xref:System.Delegate.Remove%2A>方法来实现委托操作。

trans-unit.source: Examples include the `AddHandler` and `RemoveHandler` statements in Visual Basic and the += and -= operators on delegate types in C#.
trans-unit.target: 示例包括`AddHandler`和`RemoveHandler`在 Visual Basic 中的语句和上的 + = 和-= 运算符委托 C# 中的类型。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], generic delegate types can have variant type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，泛型委托类型才能具有 variant 类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Contravariant type parameters can be used as parameter types of the delegate, and a covariant type parameter can be used as the return type.
trans-unit.target: 逆变类型参数可用作委托的参数类型和协变类型参数可以用作返回类型。

trans-unit.source: This feature allows generic delegate types that are constructed from the same generic type definition to be assignment-compatible if their type arguments are reference types with an inheritance relationship, as explained in [Covariance and Contravariance](~/docs/standard/generics/covariance-and-contravariance.md).
trans-unit.target: 此功能允许泛型委托类型从相同的泛型类型定义，以是赋值兼容如果其类型参数是引用类型具有继承关系中, 所述构造[协变和逆变](~/docs/standard/generics/covariance-and-contravariance.md)。

trans-unit.source: Generic delegates that are assignment-compatible because of variance are not necessarily combinable.
trans-unit.target: 是赋值兼容的泛型委托由于方差不一定 combinable。

trans-unit.source: To be combinable, the types must match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 若要可组合，类型必须完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that a class named `Derived` is derived from a class named `Base`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设一个名为`Derived`从名为的类派生`Base`。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of type `Action<Base>` (`Action(Of Base)` in Visual Basic) can be assigned to a variable of type `Action<Derived>`, but the two delegates cannot be combined because the types do not match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 类型的委托`Action<Base>`(`Action(Of Base)`在 Visual Basic 中) 可以分配给类型的变量的`Action<Derived>`，但是不能组合两个委托，因为类型不完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: If an invoked method throws an exception, the method stops executing, the exception is passed back to the caller of the delegate, and remaining methods in the invocation list are not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用的方法引发了异常，该方法会停止执行异常传递回该委托的调用方，并将不会调用调用列表中的剩余方法。

trans-unit.source: Catching the exception in the caller does not alter this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 在调用方中捕捉异常不会更改此行为。

trans-unit.source: When the signature of the methods invoked by a delegate includes a return value, the delegate returns the return value of the last element in the invocation list.
trans-unit.target: 当由委托调用的方法的签名包括返回值时，委托将返回调用列表中的最后一个元素的返回值。

trans-unit.source: When the signature includes a parameter that is passed by reference, the final value of the parameter is the result of every method in the invocation list executing sequentially and updating the parameter's value.
trans-unit.target: 如果签名包括通过引用传递的参数，参数的最终值将按顺序执行和更新的参数的值的调用列表中每个方法的结果。

trans-unit.source: The closest equivalent of a delegate in C or C++ is a function pointer.
trans-unit.target: 最接近的 C 或 c + + 中是委托的函数指针。

trans-unit.source: A delegate can represent a static method or an instance method.
trans-unit.target: 委托可以表示的静态方法或实例方法。

trans-unit.source: When the delegate represents an instance method, the delegate stores not only a reference to the method's entry point, but also a reference to the class instance.
trans-unit.target: 当该委托表示的实例方法时，委托将存储不仅参考方法的入口点，而且还对类实例的引用。

trans-unit.source: Unlike function pointers, delegates are object oriented and type safe.
trans-unit.target: 函数与指针不同，委托是面向对象和类型安全。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a delegate named `myMethodDelegate`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何定义一个名为的委托`myMethodDelegate`。

trans-unit.source: Instances of this delegate are created for an instance method and a static method of the nested `mySampleClass` class.
trans-unit.target: 此委托实例创建的实例方法和嵌套的静态方法`mySampleClass`类。

trans-unit.source: The delegate for the instance method requires an instance of `mySampleClass`.
trans-unit.target: 实例方法的委托需要的一个实例`mySampleClass`。

trans-unit.source: The `mySampleClass` instance is saved in a variable named `mySC`.
trans-unit.target: `mySampleClass`实例保存在变量名为`mySC`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new delegate.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个新委托。

trans-unit.source: The class instance on which the delegate invokes <c>method</c>.
trans-unit.target: 类实例，委托对其调用 <c>method</c>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the instance method that the delegate represents.
trans-unit.target: 委托表示的实例方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a delegate that invokes the specified instance method on the specified class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个委托，该委托对指定的类实例调用指定的实例方法。

trans-unit.source: This constructor cannot be used in application code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不能在应用程序代码。

trans-unit.source: To create a delegate by specifying the name of an instance method, use an overload of the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> method that specifies a method name and a target object.
trans-unit.target: 若要通过指定实例方法的名称创建委托，使用的重载<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>指定方法名称和目标对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.String%29> method overload creates a delegate for an instance method with a specified name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.String%29>方法重载具有指定名称创建的实例方法的委托。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates delegates for instance methods only.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数实例只方法创建委托。

trans-unit.source: An instance method is a method that is associated with an instance of a class; a static method is a method that is associated with the class itself.
trans-unit.target: 实例方法是一种方法与类; 的实例相关联静态方法是类本身与关联的方法。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: There was an error binding to the target method.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到目标方法时出错。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the class that defines <c>method</c>.
trans-unit.target: 表示定义 <c>method</c> 的类的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the static method that the delegate represents.
trans-unit.target: 委托表示的静态方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a delegate that invokes the specified static method from the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个委托，该委托从指定的类调用指定的静态方法。

trans-unit.source: This constructor cannot be used in application code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不能在应用程序代码。

trans-unit.source: To create a delegate by specifying the name of a static method, use an overload of the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> method that specifies a method name but does not specify a target object.
trans-unit.target: 若要通过指定静态方法的名称创建委托，使用的重载<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>指定方法名称，但未指定目标对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%29> method overload creates a static delegate for a method with a specified name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%29>方法重载具有指定名称创建静态委托方法。

trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建只为静态方法的委托。

trans-unit.target: 实例方法是一种方法与类; 的实例相关联静态方法是类本身与关联的方法。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 创建委托的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 委托的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: The clone has the same <xref:System.Type>, target, method, and invocation list as the original delegate.
trans-unit.target: 克隆具有相同<xref:System.Type>，与原始委托的目标、 方法和调用列表。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy creates a new instance of the same type as the original object, and then copies the nonstatic fields of the original object.
trans-unit.target: 浅表副本创建与原始对象，而相同的类型的新实例，然后将复制的原始对象的非静态字段。

trans-unit.source: If the field is a value type, a bit-by-bit copy of the field is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果该字段是值类型，则执行字段的按位复制。

trans-unit.source: If the field is a reference type, the reference is copied but the referred object is not; therefore, the reference in the original object and the reference in the clone point to the same object.
trans-unit.target: 如果字段是引用类型，引用将复制，但被引用的对象不;因此，原始对象中的引用和克隆中的引用点对同一对象。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, a deep copy of an object duplicates everything directly or indirectly referenced by the fields in the object.
trans-unit.target: 相比之下，对象的深层副本复制直接或间接引用的对象中的字段的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用时后期绑定通过机制如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />

trans-unit.source: Concatenates the invocation lists of the specified multicast (combinable) delegates.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的多路广播（可组合）委托的调用列表连接起来。

trans-unit.source: The array of delegates to combine.
trans-unit.target: 要组合的委托的数组。

trans-unit.source: Concatenates the invocation lists of an array of delegates.
trans-unit.target: 将委托数组的调用列表连接在一起。

trans-unit.source: A new delegate with an invocation list that concatenates the invocation lists of the delegates in the <paramref name="delegates" /> array.
trans-unit.target: 新的委托，该委托的调用列表将 <paramref name="delegates" /> 数组中的委托的调用列表串联在一起。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if <paramref name="delegates" /> is <see langword="null" />, if <paramref name="delegates" /> contains zero elements, or if every entry in <paramref name="delegates" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="delegates" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，<paramref name="delegates" /> 包含零个元素，或 <paramref name="delegates" /> 中的每个条目均为 <see langword="null" />，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the `delegates` array contains entries that are `null`, those entries are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果`delegates`数组包含的条目，将`null`，这些条目将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The invocation list can contain duplicate entries; that is, entries that refer to the same method on the same object.
trans-unit.target: 调用列表可以包含重复项;它是指对同一对象相同的方法的条目。

trans-unit.source: Generic delegates that are assignment-compatible because of variance are not necessarily combinable.
trans-unit.target: 是赋值兼容的泛型委托由于方差不一定 combinable。

trans-unit.source: To be combinable, the types must match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 若要可组合，类型必须完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that a class named `Derived` is derived from a class named `Base`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设一个名为`Derived`从名为的类派生`Base`。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of type `Action<Base>` (`Action(Of Base)` in Visual Basic) can be assigned to a variable of type `Action<Derived>`, as explained in [Covariance and Contravariance](~/docs/standard/generics/covariance-and-contravariance.md), but the two delegates cannot be combined because the types do not match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 类型的委托`Action<Base>`(`Action(Of Base)`在 Visual Basic 中) 可以分配给类型的变量的`Action<Derived>`、 中所述[协变和逆变](~/docs/standard/generics/covariance-and-contravariance.md)，但不能组合两个委托，因为类型不完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Delegate.Combine%2A> is useful for creating event handlers that call multiple methods each time an event occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Delegate.Combine%2A> 可用于创建调用多个方法均时间事件发生的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Not all the non-null entries in <paramref name="delegates" /> are instances of the same delegate type.
trans-unit.target: 不是所有 <paramref name="delegates" /> 中的非 null 项都是同一委托类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用时后期绑定通过机制如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.source: The delegate whose invocation list comes first.
trans-unit.target: 最先出现其调用列表的委托。

trans-unit.source: The delegate whose invocation list comes last.
trans-unit.target: 最后出现其调用列表的委托。

trans-unit.source: Concatenates the invocation lists of two delegates.
trans-unit.target: 将两个委托的调用列表连接在一起。

trans-unit.source: A new delegate with an invocation list that concatenates the invocation lists of <paramref name="a" /> and <paramref name="b" /> in that order.
trans-unit.target: 新的委托，它的调用列表将 <paramref name="a" /> 和 <paramref name="b" /> 的调用列表按该顺序连接在一起。

trans-unit.source: Returns <paramref name="a" /> if <paramref name="b" /> is <see langword="null" />, returns <paramref name="b" /> if <paramref name="a" /> is a null reference, and returns a null reference if both <paramref name="a" /> and <paramref name="b" /> are null references.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="b" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，则返回 <paramref name="a" />；如果 <paramref name="a" /> 为 null 引用，则返回 <paramref name="b" />；如果 <paramref name="a" /> 和 <paramref name="b" /> 均为 null 引用，则返回 null 引用。

trans-unit.source: The invocation list can contain duplicate entries; that is, entries that refer to the same method on the same object.
trans-unit.target: 调用列表可以包含重复项;它是指对同一对象相同的方法的条目。

trans-unit.source: Generic delegates that are assignment-compatible because of variance are not necessarily combinable.
trans-unit.target: 是赋值兼容的泛型委托由于方差不一定 combinable。

trans-unit.source: To be combinable, the types must match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 若要可组合，类型必须完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that a class named `Derived` is derived from a class named `Base`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设一个名为`Derived`从名为的类派生`Base`。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of type `Action<Base>` (`Action(Of Base)` in Visual Basic) can be assigned to a variable of type `Action<Derived>`, as explained in [Covariance and Contravariance](~/docs/standard/generics/covariance-and-contravariance.md), but the two delegates cannot be combined because the types do not match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 类型的委托`Action<Base>`(`Action(Of Base)`在 Visual Basic 中) 可以分配给类型的变量的`Action<Derived>`、 中所述[协变和逆变](~/docs/standard/generics/covariance-and-contravariance.md)，但不能组合两个委托，因为类型不完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Delegate.Combine%2A> is useful for creating event handlers that call multiple methods each time an event occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Delegate.Combine%2A> 可用于创建调用多个方法均时间事件发生的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Both <paramref name="a" /> and <paramref name="b" /> are not <see langword="null" />, and <paramref name="a" /> and <paramref name="b" /> are not instances of the same delegate type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="a" /> 和 <paramref name="b" /> 均不为 <see langword="null" />，且 <paramref name="a" /> 和 <paramref name="b" /> 不是相同委托类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用时后期绑定通过机制如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />

trans-unit.source: The multicast (combinable) delegate whose invocation list to append to the end of the invocation list of the current multicast (combinable) delegate.
trans-unit.target: 多路广播（可组合）委托，其调用列表要追加到当前多路广播（可组合）委托的调用列表的结尾。

trans-unit.source: Concatenates the invocation lists of the specified multicast (combinable) delegate and the current multicast (combinable) delegate.
trans-unit.target: 将指定多路广播（可组合）委托和当前多路广播（可组合）委托的调用列表连接起来。

trans-unit.source: A new multicast (combinable) delegate with an invocation list that concatenates the invocation list of the current multicast (combinable) delegate and the invocation list of <paramref name="d" />, or the current multicast (combinable) delegate if <paramref name="d" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的多路广播（可组合）委托，其调用列表将当前多路广播（可组合）委托的调用列表和 <paramref name="d" /> 的调用列表连接在一起；或者如果 <paramref name="d" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，则返回当前多路广播（可组合）委托。

trans-unit.source: This method applies only if the current delegate is multicast (combinable).
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅适用于当前委托是多路广播 （可组合）。

trans-unit.source: The current implementation simply throws a <xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 当前实现只需引发<xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: The invocation list can contain duplicate entries; that is, entries that refer to the same method on the same object.
trans-unit.target: 调用列表可以包含重复项;它是指对同一对象相同的方法的条目。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 始终引发。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用时后期绑定通过机制如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a delegate of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定类型的委托。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of delegate to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的委托的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> describing the static or instance method the delegate is to represent.
trans-unit.target: 描述该委托要表示的静态或实例方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Only static methods are supported in the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中仅支持静态方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a delegate of the specified type to represent the specified static method.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定类型的委托以表示指定的静态方法。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of the specified type to represent the specified static method.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定静态方法的指定类型的委托。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, this method overload creates delegates for static methods only.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，此方法重载创建只为静态方法的委托。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this method overload also can create open instance method delegates; that is, delegates that explicitly supply the hidden first argument of instance methods.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，此方法重载还可以创建公开实例方法委托;即，显式提供的隐藏第一个参数的委托实例方法。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed explanation, see the more general <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%29> method overload, which allows you to create all combinations of open or closed delegates for instance or static methods, and optionally to specify a first argument.
trans-unit.target: 有关的详细说明，请参阅详细常规<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%29>方法重载，它允许您创建的实例或静态方法，开放或封闭委托的所有组合并 （可选） 指定的第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: This method overload should be used when the delegate is not closed over its first argument, because it is somewhat faster in that case.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载应时能委托未关闭通过其第一个参数，因为它在这种情况下是某种程度上更快。

trans-unit.source: This method overload is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload and specifying `true` for `throwOnBindFailure`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载是等效于调用<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法重载并指定`true`为`throwOnBindFailure`。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public methods if the caller has been granted <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag and if the grant set of the non-public methods is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共方法，如果调用方已被授予<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，并且如果非公共方法的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。

trans-unit.source: (See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).)
trans-unit.target: (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Compatible Parameter Types and Return Type
trans-unit.target: 兼容的参数类型和返回类型

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, the parameter types and return type of a delegate created using this method overload must be compatible with the parameter types and return type of the method the delegate represents; the types do not have to match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，参数类型和使用此方法重载创建委托的返回类型必须与兼容的参数类型和委托表示; 的方法的返回类型类型不需要完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: This represents a relaxation of the binding behavior in the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, where the types must match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 这表示.NET framework 版本 1.0 和 1.1 中，类型必须完全匹配的绑定行为宽松。

trans-unit.source: A parameter of a delegate is compatible with the corresponding parameter of a method if the type of the delegate parameter is more restrictive than the type of the method parameter, because this guarantees that an argument passed to the delegate can be passed safely to the method.
trans-unit.target: 如果委托参数的类型的限制性强于方法参数的类型，则该委托的参数与该方法的相应参数兼容，因为这可保证传递给委托的参数可以安全地传递给方法。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the return type of a delegate is compatible with the return type of a method if the return type of the method is more restrictive than the return type of the delegate, because this guarantees that the return value of the method can be cast safely to the return type of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果方法的返回类型的限制性强于委托的返回类型，则该委托的返回类型与该方法的返回类型兼容，因为这可保证方法的返回值可以安全地强制转换为委托的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, a delegate with a parameter of type <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> and a return type of <xref:System.Object> can represent a method with a parameter of type <xref:System.Object> and a return value of type <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，类型的参数的委托<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>和返回类型为<xref:System.Object>可以表示具有类型的参数的方法<xref:System.Object>和类型的返回值<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first example demonstrates the two kinds of delegates that can be created with this method overload: open over an instance method and open over a static method.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例演示两种类型的委托，可以使用此方法重载来创建： 打开通过实例方法和静态方法通过打开。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates compatible parameter types and return types.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示兼容的参数类型和返回类型。

trans-unit.source: **Example 1**
The following code example demonstrates the two ways a delegate can be created using this overload of the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示两种方法，可以使用此重载创建委托<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: There are two overloads of the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> method that specify a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> but not a first argument; their functionality is the same except that one allows you to specify whether to throw on failure to bind, and the other always throws.
trans-unit.target: 有两种重载的<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>指定的方法<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>但不是的第一个参数; 它们的功能是相同，只不过其中使您可以指定是否在绑定，失败时引发，并且另总是引发。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses both overloads.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用两个重载。

trans-unit.source: The example declares a class `C` with a static method `M2` and an instance method `M1`, and two delegate types: `D1` takes an instance of `C` and a string, and `D2` takes a string.
trans-unit.target: 此示例声明一个类`C`具有静态方法`M2`和一个实例方法`M1`，和两个委托类型：`D1`采用实例`C`和一个字符串，和`D2`接受一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: A second class named `Example` contains the code that creates the delegates.
trans-unit.target: 名为第二个类`Example`包含创建委托的代码。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of type `D1`, representing an open instance method, is created for the instance method `M1`.
trans-unit.target: 类型的委托`D1`，表示打开的实例方法，创建的实例方法`M1`。

trans-unit.source: An instance must be passed when the delegate is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 当调用委托时，必须传递实例。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of type `D2`, representing an open static method, is created for the static method `M2`.
trans-unit.target: 类型的委托`D2`，表示打开的静态方法，为静态方法创建`M2`。

trans-unit.source: **Example 2**
The following code example demonstrates compatibility of parameter types and return types.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的参数类型兼容性和返回类型。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines a base class named `Base` and a class named `Derived` that derives from `Base`.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例定义一个名为的基本类`Base`和一个名为类`Derived`派生自`Base`。

trans-unit.source: The derived class has a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method named `MyMethod` with one parameter of type `Base` and a return type of `Derived`.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类具有`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 名为方法`MyMethod`与一个类型的参数`Base`和返回类型为`Derived`。

trans-unit.source: The code example also defines a delegate named `Example` that has one parameter of type `Derived` and a return type of `Base`.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例还定义了名为的委托`Example`它具有一个参数的类型`Derived`和返回类型为`Base`。

trans-unit.source: The code example demonstrates that the delegate named `Example` can be used to represent the method `MyMethod`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例演示委托名为`Example`可以用于表示方法`MyMethod`。

trans-unit.source: The method can be bound to the delegate because:
trans-unit.target: 可以将方法绑定到委托，因为：

trans-unit.source: The parameter type of the delegate (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of `MyMethod` (`Base`), so that it is always safe to pass the argument of the delegate to `MyMethod`.
trans-unit.target: 委托的参数类型 (`Derived`) 是比参数类型的限制性更强`MyMethod`(`Base`)，以便它始终是安全传递到委托的自变量`MyMethod`。

trans-unit.source: The return type of `MyMethod` (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of the delegate (`Base`), so that it is always safe to cast the return type of the method to the return type of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 返回类型`MyMethod`(`Derived`) 是限制性强于委托的参数类型 (`Base`)，以便它始终是安全强制转换为委托的返回类型的方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: The code example produces no output.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例生成任何输出。

trans-unit.target: 调用方没有访问 <paramref name="method" /> 所必需的权限。

trans-unit.source: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用时后期绑定通过机制如<see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of delegate to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的委托的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to which the delegate is bound, or <see langword="null" /> to treat <c>method</c> as <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 委托要绑定到的对象，若要将 <c>method</c> 作为 <see langword="static" />（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Shared" />），则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> describing the static or instance method the delegate is to represent.
trans-unit.target: 描述该委托要表示的静态或实例方法的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a delegate of the specified type that represents the specified static or instance method, with the specified first argument.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的第一个参数创建指定类型的委托，该委托表示指定的静态方法或实例方法。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of the specified type that represents the specified static or instance method.
trans-unit.target: 指定类型的委托，表示指定的静态或实例方法。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload and specifying `true` for `throwOnBindFailure`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法重载是等效于调用<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法重载并指定`true`为`throwOnBindFailure`。

trans-unit.source: These two overloads provide the most flexible way to create delegates.
trans-unit.target: 这两种重载提供最灵活的方式来创建委托。

trans-unit.source: You can use them to create delegates for either static or instance methods, and optionally to specify the first argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建的代理人的静态或实例方法，并 （可选） 指定的第一个参数，你可以使用它们。

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a first argument, use the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%29> method overload for better performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供的第一个参数，使用<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%29>方法重载，以更好的性能。

trans-unit.source: The delegate type and the method must have compatible return types.
trans-unit.target: 委托类型和方法必须具有兼容的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: That is, the return type of `method` must be assignable to the return type of `type`.
trans-unit.target: 返回类型，即`method`必须可赋给的返回类型`type`。

trans-unit.source: If `firstArgument` is supplied, it is passed to `method` every time the delegate is invoked; `firstArgument` is said to be bound to the delegate, and the delegate is said to be closed over its first argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果`firstArgument`是提供，它将传递到`method`每次调用委托时;`firstArgument`称为绑定到委托，并委托被称为关闭通过其第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: If `method` is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the argument list supplied when invoking the delegate includes all parameters except the first; if `method` is an instance method, then `firstArgument` is passed to the hidden instance parameter (represented by `this` in C#, or by `Me` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，则自变量调用委托时提供的列表包含第一个; 以外的所有参数，如果`method`是实例方法，然后`firstArgument`传递到隐藏的实例参数 (由表示`this`在 C# 中，或通过`Me`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: If `firstArgument` is supplied, the first parameter of `method` must be a reference type, and `firstArgument` must be compatible with that type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`firstArgument`提供，则的第一个参数`method`必须是引用类型，和`firstArgument`必须与该类型兼容。

trans-unit.source: If `method` is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) and its first parameter is of type <xref:System.Object> or <xref:System.ValueType>, then `firstArgument` can be a value type.
trans-unit.target: 如果`method`是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，并且其第一个参数是类型<xref:System.Object>或<xref:System.ValueType>，然后`firstArgument`可为值类型。

trans-unit.source: In this case `firstArgument` is automatically boxed.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下`firstArgument`自动装箱。

trans-unit.source: Automatic boxing does not occur for any other arguments, as it would in a C# or Visual Basic function call.
trans-unit.target: 自动装箱不会发生的任何其他自变量，因为它将在 C# 或 Visual Basic 函数中调用。

trans-unit.source: If `firstArgument` is a null reference and `method` is an instance method, the result depends on the signatures of the delegate type `type` and of `method`:
trans-unit.target: 如果`firstArgument`为空引用和`method`是实例方法，该结果取决于函数调用的委托类型签名`type`和`method`:

trans-unit.source: If the signature of `type` explicitly includes the hidden first parameter of `method`, the delegate is said to represent an open instance method.
trans-unit.target: 如果签名`type`显式包括的隐藏第一个参数`method`，则委托被称为来表示打开的实例方法。

trans-unit.source: When the delegate is invoked, the first argument in the argument list is passed to the hidden instance parameter of `method`.
trans-unit.target: 待用委托时，将自变量列表中的第一个参数传递给的隐藏的实例参数`method`。

trans-unit.source: If the signatures of `method` and `type` match (that is, all parameter types are compatible), then the delegate is said to be closed over a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果函数调用的签名`method`和`type`匹配 （即，所有参数类型都是兼容），则委托称为即将关闭通过空引用。

trans-unit.source: Invoking the delegate is like calling an instance method on a null instance, which is not a particularly useful thing to do.
trans-unit.target: 调用委托就像在不是特别有用的办法就的 null 实例上调用实例方法。

trans-unit.source: If `firstArgument` is a null reference and `method` is static, the result depends on the signatures of the delegate type `type` and of `method`:
trans-unit.target: 如果`firstArgument`为空引用和`method`是静态的则依赖于函数调用的委托类型签名`type`和`method`:

trans-unit.source: If the signature of `method` and `type` match (that is, all parameter types are compatible), the delegate is said to represent an open static method.
trans-unit.target: 如果签名`method`和`type`匹配 （即，所有参数类型都是兼容），则委托被称为来表示开放的静态方法。

trans-unit.source: This is the most common case for static methods.
trans-unit.target: 这是最常见的情况的静态方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can get slightly better performance by using the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以通过使用获取略有更好的性能<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%29>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: If the signature of `type` begins with the second parameter of `method` and the rest of the parameter types are compatible, then the delegate is said to be closed over a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果签名`type`开头的第二个参数`method`和参数类型的其余部分是兼容的设备，然后委托被称为通过 null 引用封闭。

trans-unit.source: When the delegate is invoked, a null reference is passed to the first parameter of `method`.
trans-unit.target: 待用委托时，到的第一个参数传递 null 引用`method`。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public methods if the caller has been granted <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag and if the grant set of the non-public methods is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共方法，如果调用方已被授予<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，并且如果非公共方法的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。

trans-unit.source: (See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).)
trans-unit.target: (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Compatible Parameter Types and Return Type
trans-unit.target: 兼容的参数类型和返回类型

trans-unit.source: The parameter types and return type of a delegate must be compatible with the parameter types and return type of the method the delegate represents; the types do not have to match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 参数类型和委托的返回类型必须与参数类型和委托表示; 的方法的返回类型兼容类型不需要完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, the types must match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，类型必须完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: A parameter of a delegate is compatible with the corresponding parameter of a method if the type of the delegate parameter is more restrictive than the type of the method parameter, because this guarantees that an argument passed to the delegate can be passed safely to the method.
trans-unit.target: 如果委托参数的类型的限制性强于方法参数的类型，则该委托的参数与该方法的相应参数兼容，因为这可保证传递给委托的参数可以安全地传递给方法。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the return type of a delegate is compatible with the return type of a method if the return type of the method is more restrictive than the return type of the delegate, because this guarantees that the return value of the method can be cast safely to the return type of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果方法的返回类型的限制性强于委托的返回类型，则该委托的返回类型与该方法的返回类型兼容，因为这可保证方法的返回值可以安全地强制转换为委托的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, a delegate with a parameter of type <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> and a return type of <xref:System.Object> can represent a method with a parameter of type <xref:System.Object> and a return value of type <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，类型的参数的委托<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>和返回类型为<xref:System.Object>可以表示具有类型的参数的方法<xref:System.Object>和类型的返回值<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>。

trans-unit.source: Determining the Methods a Delegate Can Represent
trans-unit.target: 确定方法委托可以表示

trans-unit.source: Another useful way to think of the flexibility provided by this overload of <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> is that any given delegate can represent four different combinations of method signature and method kind (static versus instance).
trans-unit.target: 另一个有用的办法有助于理解的此重载提供的灵活性<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>任何给定的委托可以表示的方法签名和方法类型 （静态和实例） 的四个不同的组合。

trans-unit.source: Consider a delegate type `D` with one argument of type `C`.
trans-unit.target: 请考虑一个委托类型`D`带有一个自变量类型的`C`。

trans-unit.source: The following describes the methods `D` can represent, ignoring the return type since it must match in all cases:
trans-unit.target: 以下介绍的方法`D`可以代表，忽略返回类型，因为它必须匹配在所有情况下：

trans-unit.source: `D` can represent any instance method that has exactly one argument of type `C`, regardless of what type the instance method belongs to.
trans-unit.target: `D` 可以表示任何具有恰好一个类型自变量的实例方法`C`，无论是何种类型的实例方法属于。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> is called, `firstArgument` is an instance of the type `method` belongs to, and the resulting delegate is said to be closed over that instance.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>调用时，`firstArgument`是类型的实例`method`所属，而称将得到的委托是通过该实例关闭。

trans-unit.source: (Trivially, `D` can also be closed over a null reference if `firstArgument` is a null reference.)
trans-unit.target: (一般而言，`D`如果还可以通过 null 引用封闭`firstArgument`为空引用。)

trans-unit.source: `D` can represent an instance method of `C` that has no arguments.
trans-unit.target: `D` 可以表示的实例方法`C`不带任何参数。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> is called, `firstArgument` is a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>调用时，`firstArgument`为空引用。

trans-unit.source: The resulting delegate represents an open instance method, and an instance of `C` must be supplied each time it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 结果的委托表示打开的实例方法，并且实例`C`必须提供每次调用它。

trans-unit.source: `D` can represent a static method that takes one argument of type `C`, and that method can belong to any type.
trans-unit.target: `D` 可以表示采用一个类型自变量的静态方法`C`，和方法可以属于任何类型。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> is called, `firstArgument` is a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>调用时，`firstArgument`为空引用。

trans-unit.source: The resulting delegate represents an open static method, and an instance of `C` must be supplied each time it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 结果的委托表示开放的静态方法，并且实例`C`必须提供每次调用它。

trans-unit.source: `D` can represent a static method that belongs to type `F` and has two arguments, of type `F` and type `C`.
trans-unit.target: `D` 可以表示所属类型的静态方法`F`并且有两个参数，类型为`F`和类型`C`。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> is called, `firstArgument` is an instance of `F`.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>调用时，`firstArgument`是的一个实例`F`。

trans-unit.source: The resulting delegate represents a static method that is closed over that instance of `F`.
trans-unit.target: 将得到的委托表示关闭该实例的静态方法`F`。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the case where `F` and `C` are the same type, the static method has two arguments of that type.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在这种情况其中`F`和`C`具有相同的类型、 静态方法包含该类型的两个参数。

trans-unit.source: (In this case, `D` is closed over a null reference if `firstArgument` is a null reference.)
trans-unit.target: (在这种情况下，`D`如果通过 null 引用封闭`firstArgument`为空引用。)

trans-unit.source: This section contains three code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含三个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first example demonstrates the four kinds of delegates that can be created: closed over an instance method, open over an instance method, open over a static method, and closed over a static method.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例演示委托可以创建四种类型： 关闭通过实例方法，通过实例方法，通过静态方法，打开打开和关闭的静态方法通过。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates compatible parameter types and return types.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示兼容的参数类型和返回类型。

trans-unit.source: The third code example defines a single delegate type, and shows all the methods that delegate type can represent.
trans-unit.target: 第三个代码示例定义一个委托类型，并演示委托类型的所有方法可以都表示。

trans-unit.source: **Example 1**
The following code example demonstrates the four ways a delegate can be created using this overload of the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示可以使用此重载创建委托的四个方法<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: There are two overloads of the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> method that specify `firstArgument` and a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>; their functionality is the same except that one allows you to specify whether to throw on failure to bind, and the other always throws.
trans-unit.target: 有两种重载的<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>指定的方法`firstArgument`和<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>; 它们的功能是相同，只不过其中使您可以指定是否在绑定，失败时引发，并且另总是引发。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses both overloads.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用两个重载。

trans-unit.source: The example declares a class `C` with a static method `M2` and an instance method `M1`, and three delegate types: `D1` takes an instance of `C` and a string, `D2` takes a string, and `D3` has no arguments.
trans-unit.target: 此示例声明一个类`C`具有静态方法`M2`和一个实例方法`M1`，和三个委托类型：`D1`采用实例`C`和一个字符串，`D2`采用字符串和`D3`没有自变量。

trans-unit.source: A second class named `Example` contains the code that creates the delegates.
trans-unit.target: 名为第二个类`Example`包含创建委托的代码。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of type `D2`, closed over an instance of `C`, is created for the instance method `M1`.
trans-unit.target: 类型的委托`D2`、 已关闭的实例通过`C`，创建的实例方法`M1`。

trans-unit.source: It is invoked with different strings, to show that the bound instance of `C` is always used.
trans-unit.target: 使用不同的字符串，以显示的绑定的实例调用`C`始终使用。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of type `D1`, representing an open instance method, is created for the instance method `M1`.
trans-unit.target: 类型的委托`D1`，表示打开的实例方法，创建的实例方法`M1`。

trans-unit.source: An instance must be passed when the delegate is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 当调用委托时，必须传递实例。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of type `D2`, representing an open static method, is created for the static method `M2`.
trans-unit.target: 类型的委托`D2`，表示打开的静态方法，为静态方法创建`M2`。

trans-unit.source: Finally, a delegate of type `D3`, closed over a string, is created for the static method `M2`.
trans-unit.target: 最后，类型的委托`D3`，通过字符串封闭式的为静态方法创建`M2`。

trans-unit.source: The method is invoked to show that it uses the bound string.
trans-unit.target: 调用的方法以显示其使用的绑定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: **Example 2**
The following code example demonstrates compatibility of parameter types and return types.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的参数类型兼容性和返回类型。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%29>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The use of other overloads that take <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> is similar.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他重载采用<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>类似。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines a base class named `Base` and a class named `Derived` that derives from `Base`.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例定义一个名为的基本类`Base`和一个名为类`Derived`派生自`Base`。

trans-unit.source: The derived class has a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method named `MyMethod` with one parameter of type `Base` and a return type of `Derived`.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类具有`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 名为方法`MyMethod`与一个类型的参数`Base`和返回类型为`Derived`。

trans-unit.source: The code example also defines a delegate named `Example` that has one parameter of type `Derived` and a return type of `Base`.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例还定义了名为的委托`Example`它具有一个参数的类型`Derived`和返回类型为`Base`。

trans-unit.source: The code example demonstrates that the delegate named `Example` can be used to represent the method `MyMethod`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例演示委托名为`Example`可以用于表示方法`MyMethod`。

trans-unit.source: The method can be bound to the delegate because:
trans-unit.target: 可以将方法绑定到委托，因为：

trans-unit.source: The parameter type of the delegate (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of `MyMethod` (`Base`), so that it is always safe to pass the argument of the delegate to `MyMethod`.
trans-unit.target: 委托的参数类型 (`Derived`) 是比参数类型的限制性更强`MyMethod`(`Base`)，以便它始终是安全传递到委托的自变量`MyMethod`。

trans-unit.source: The return type of `MyMethod` (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of the delegate (`Base`), so that it is always safe to cast the return type of the method to the return type of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 返回类型`MyMethod`(`Derived`) 是限制性强于委托的参数类型 (`Base`)，以便它始终是安全强制转换为委托的返回类型的方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: The code example produces no output.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: **Example 3**
The following code example shows all the methods a single delegate type can represent, using the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> method to create the delegates.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示所有方法可以代表单个委托类型，使用<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>方法来创建委托。

trans-unit.source: There are two overloads of the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> method that specify `firstArgument` and a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>; their functionality is the same except that one allows you to specify whether to throw on failure to bind, and the other always throws.
trans-unit.target: 有两种重载的<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>指定的方法`firstArgument`和<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>; 它们的功能是相同，只不过其中使您可以指定是否在绑定，失败时引发，并且另总是引发。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses both overloads.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用两个重载。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines two classes, `C` and `F`, and a delegate type `D` with one argument of type `C`.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例定义两个类，`C`和`F`，和委托类型`D`带有一个自变量类型的`C`。

trans-unit.source: The classes have matching static and instance methods `M1`, `M3`, and `M4`, and class `C` also has an instance method `M2` that has no arguments.
trans-unit.target: 类具有匹配的静态和实例方法`M1`， `M3`，和`M4`，和类`C`还具有实例方法`M2`不带任何参数。

trans-unit.source: A third class named `Example` contains the code that creates the delegates.
trans-unit.target: 一个名为的第三类`Example`包含创建委托的代码。

trans-unit.source: Delegates are created for instance method `M1` of type `C` and type `F`; each is closed over an instance of the respective type.
trans-unit.target: 委托创建的实例方法`M1`类型的`C`和类型`F`; 每个已通过各自类型的实例关闭。

trans-unit.source: Method `M1` of type `C` displays the `ID` properties of the bound instance and of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 方法`M1`类型的`C`显示`ID`属性的绑定实例和自变量。

trans-unit.source: A delegate is created for method `M2` of type `C`.
trans-unit.target: 方法创建委托`M2`类型的`C`。

trans-unit.source: This is an open instance delegate, in which the argument of the delegate represents the hidden first argument on the instance method.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个开放的实例委托，在其中委托的自变量表示实例方法的隐藏第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: The method has no other arguments.
trans-unit.target: 该方法具有任何其他自变量。

trans-unit.source: It is called as if it were a static method.
trans-unit.target: 它称为就像它是静态方法。

trans-unit.source: Delegates are created for static method `M3` of type `C` and type `F`; these are open static delegates.
trans-unit.target: 为静态方法创建委托`M3`类型的`C`和类型`F`; 这些是打开的静态委托。

trans-unit.source: Finally, delegates are created for static method `M4` of type `C` and type `F`; each method has the declaring type as its first argument, and an instance of the type is supplied, so the delegates are closed over their first arguments.
trans-unit.target: 最后，静态方法创建委托`M4`类型的`C`和类型`F`; 每种方法有作为其第一个参数的声明类型和提供的类型的实例，因此委托关闭通过其第一个参数.

trans-unit.source: Method `M4` of type `C` displays the `ID` properties of the bound instance and of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 方法`M4`类型的`C`显示`ID`属性的绑定实例和自变量。

trans-unit.source: This method creates delegates for instance methods only.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建委托实例仅方法。

trans-unit.source: An instance method is a method that is associated with an instance of a class; a static method is a method that is associated with the class itself.
trans-unit.target: 实例方法是一种方法与类; 的实例相关联静态方法是类本身与关联的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method overload is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload, specifying `false` for `ignoreCase` and `true` for `throwOnBindFailure`.

trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共方法，如果调用方已被授予<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，并且如果非公共方法的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。

trans-unit.target: 表示指定静态方法的指定类型的委托。

trans-unit.source: This method overload can create open static method delegates and open instance method delegates — that is, delegates that expose the hidden first argument of instance methods.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载可以创建开放的静态方法委托并打开实例方法委托-公开的隐藏第一个参数的委托，它是实例方法。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed explanation, see the more general <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload, which allows you to create all combinations of open or closed delegates for instance or static methods.
trans-unit.target: 有关的详细说明，请参阅详细常规<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法重载，它允许你对实例创建所有的开放或封闭委托组合或静态方法。

trans-unit.source: This method overload should be used when the delegate is not closed over its first argument, because it is somewhat faster in that case.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载应时能委托未关闭通过其第一个参数，因为它在这种情况下是某种程度上更快。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public methods if the caller has been granted <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag and if the grant set of the non-public methods is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共方法，如果调用方已被授予<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，并且如果非公共方法的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。

trans-unit.target: (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)

trans-unit.target: 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Compatible Parameter Types and Return Type
trans-unit.target: 兼容的参数类型和返回类型

trans-unit.source: The parameter types and return type of a delegate must be compatible with the parameter types and return type of the method the delegate represents; the types do not have to match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 参数类型和委托的返回类型必须与参数类型和委托表示; 的方法的返回类型兼容类型不需要完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1, the types must match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，类型必须完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: A parameter of a delegate is compatible with the corresponding parameter of a method if the type of the delegate parameter is more restrictive than the type of the method parameter, because this guarantees that an argument passed to the delegate can be passed safely to the method.
trans-unit.target: 如果委托参数的类型的限制性强于方法参数的类型，则该委托的参数与该方法的相应参数兼容，因为这可保证传递给委托的参数可以安全地传递给方法。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the return type of a delegate is compatible with the return type of a method if the return type of the method is more restrictive than the return type of the delegate, because this guarantees that the return value of the method can be cast safely to the return type of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果方法的返回类型的限制性强于委托的返回类型，则该委托的返回类型与该方法的返回类型兼容，因为这可保证方法的返回值可以安全地强制转换为委托的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, a delegate with a parameter of type <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> and a return type of <xref:System.Object> can represent a method with a parameter of type <xref:System.Object> and a return value of type <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，类型的参数的委托<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>和返回类型为<xref:System.Object>可以表示具有类型的参数的方法<xref:System.Object>和类型的返回值<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first example demonstrates the two kinds of delegates that can be created with this method overload: open over an instance method and open over a static method.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例演示两种类型的委托，可以使用此方法重载来创建： 打开通过实例方法和静态方法通过打开。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates compatible parameter types and return types.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示兼容的参数类型和返回类型。

trans-unit.source: **Example 1**
The following code example demonstrates the two ways a delegate can be created using this overload of the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示两种方法，可以使用此重载创建委托<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: There are two overloads of the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A> method that specify a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> but not a first argument; their functionality is the same except that one allows you to specify whether to throw on failure to bind, and the other always throws.
trans-unit.target: 有两种重载的<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%2A>指定的方法<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>但不是的第一个参数; 它们的功能是相同，只不过其中使您可以指定是否在绑定，失败时引发，并且另总是引发。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses both overloads.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用两个重载。

trans-unit.source: The example declares a class `C` with a static method `M2` and an instance method `M1`, and two delegate types: `D1` takes an instance of `C` and a string, and `D2` takes a string.
trans-unit.target: 此示例声明一个类`C`具有静态方法`M2`和一个实例方法`M1`，和两个委托类型：`D1`采用实例`C`和一个字符串，和`D2`接受一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: A second class named `Example` contains the code that creates the delegates.
trans-unit.target: 名为第二个类`Example`包含创建委托的代码。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of type `D1`, representing an open instance method, is created for the instance method `M1`.
trans-unit.target: 类型的委托`D1`，表示打开的实例方法，创建的实例方法`M1`。

trans-unit.source: An instance must be passed when the delegate is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 当调用委托时，必须传递实例。

trans-unit.source: A delegate of type `D2`, representing an open static method, is created for the static method `M2`.
trans-unit.target: 类型的委托`D2`，表示打开的静态方法，为静态方法创建`M2`。

trans-unit.source: **Example 2**
The following code example demonstrates compatibility of parameter types and return types.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的参数类型兼容性和返回类型。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例使用<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Reflection.MethodInfo%29>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The use of other overloads that take <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> is similar.
trans-unit.target: 使用其他重载采用<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>类似。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines a base class named `Base` and a class named `Derived` that derives from `Base`.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例定义一个名为的基本类`Base`和一个名为类`Derived`派生自`Base`。

trans-unit.source: The derived class has a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method named `MyMethod` with one parameter of type `Base` and a return type of `Derived`.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类具有`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 名为方法`MyMethod`与一个类型的参数`Base`和返回类型为`Derived`。

trans-unit.source: The code example also defines a delegate named `Example` that has one parameter of type `Derived` and a return type of `Base`.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例还定义了名为的委托`Example`它具有一个参数的类型`Derived`和返回类型为`Base`。

trans-unit.source: The code example demonstrates that the delegate named `Example` can be used to represent the method `MyMethod`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例演示委托名为`Example`可以用于表示方法`MyMethod`。

trans-unit.source: The method can be bound to the delegate because:
trans-unit.target: 可以将方法绑定到委托，因为：

trans-unit.source: The parameter type of the delegate (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of `MyMethod` (`Base`), so that it is always safe to pass the argument of the delegate to `MyMethod`.
trans-unit.target: 委托的参数类型 (`Derived`) 是比参数类型的限制性更强`MyMethod`(`Base`)，以便它始终是安全传递到委托的自变量`MyMethod`。

trans-unit.source: The return type of `MyMethod` (`Derived`) is more restrictive than the parameter type of the delegate (`Base`), so that it is always safe to cast the return type of the method to the return type of the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 返回类型`MyMethod`(`Derived`) 是限制性强于委托的参数类型 (`Base`)，以便它始终是安全强制转换为委托的返回类型的方法的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: The code example produces no output.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: This method creates delegates for static methods only.

trans-unit.source: An instance method is a method that is associated with an instance of a class; a static method is a method that is associated with the class itself.

trans-unit.source: This method overload is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload, specifying `false` for `ignoreCase` and `true` for `throwOnBindFailure`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载是等效于调用<xref:System.Delegate.CreateDelegate%28System.Type%2CSystem.Type%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法重载，指定`false`为`ignoreCase`和`true`为`throwOnBindFailure`。
